snippet.title: Burning Daylight Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the graduation game ‘Burning Daylight’

Download the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1052070/Burning_Daylight/

Waking up naked in a slaughterhouse, you must escape and travel through a dystopian world to uncover the truth of your origin.

Burning Daylight was made by a team of 3rd year Character Animation & CG Art students at The Animation Workshop/VIA University College in Viborg, Denmark. 

Check out the individual students blogs (links below) to learn more about the talent behind the film

Credits
Frederik Danger Jeppesen (Director): https://www.artstation.com/frederikdangerjeppesen
Ole Martin Josefsen (Technical Art Director): https://www.artstation.com/ole
Bernar Aganchyan (Art Director): https://www.artstation.com/archon
Matilde Vinther (Production Manager/CG Artist): https://vimeo.com/243514550
Anja Sloth Pedersen (Production Manager Ass./CG Artist): http://anjaspedersen.blogspot.com/
David Nissen Schmidt (Head of Animation): https://vimeo.com/256285382
Marcus Richter (CG Artist/Houdini): http://www.marcusrichter.dk/
Simon Furbo Christiansen (CG Artist): https://sfurbo.artstation.com/
Thorbjørn Oskarsson Harders (CG Artist): https://www.artstation.com/oskarsson250
Nataschja Caja (Additional Animation): https://www.artstation.com/papercutzz
Mario Stefan Grosu (Additional Animation): https://vimeo.com/mariogrosu


Want to know more about The Animation Workshop/VIA University College?
Website: animwork.dk/en/
Facebook: facebook.com/pages/The-Animation-Workshop-Official-Page/10452541819
Tumblr: theanimationworkshop.tumblr.com/
Twitter: twitter.com/TAW_Denmark
Instagram: instagram.com/animationworkshop/
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/the-animation-workshop/
